markdown:
These sacred feathered serpents tirelessly serve the powers of law and good. Some operate directly as messengers and intermediaries of the deities, while others operate independently in aiding the cause of righteousness. Either way, they watch over mortals and try to influence and aid them from the shadows, shifting from plane to plane to spread wisdom and healing where they are needed. Some quetz couatls are worshipped as divinities in remote or isolated societies, and while they do not encourage such veneration, they use the trust placed in them to foster peace and cooperation with others. Quetz couatls are typically 10 to 20 feet long, with iridescent blue and green scales. Their glorious wings of rainbow-hued feathers span 15 feet and weigh nearly a ton. They are carnivorous, feeding on birds, mammals, and even the occasional evil [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91). **[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 29 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24 [Quetz Couatl](/Monsters.aspx?ID=587) **Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 54 2.0 **Perception** +21; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_detect alignment_](/Spells.aspx?ID=65) **Languages** [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2); [telepathy 100 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +16, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +19, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +22, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +22, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +19, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +22, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +16 **Str** +7 **Dex** +3 **Con** +5 **Int** +6 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +5 --- **AC** 30 **Fort** +19 **Ref** +19 **Will** +21 **HP** 175 --- **Speed** 15 feet, fly 50 feet **Melee** jaws +23 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 2d10+13 piercing plus quetz couatl venom and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Divine Innate Spells** DC 29 - **Cantrips (5th)** [Disrupt Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=79), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177) - **2nd** [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (self only; at will) - **3rd** [Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) (at will) - **4th** [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Gaseous Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=129) - **5th** [Breath of Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=29), [Divine Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=86) - **7th** [Ethereal Jaunt](/Spells.aspx?ID=105) (at will), [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (self only) - **Constant (5th)** [Detect Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=65) (all alignments simultaneously) **[Greater Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=19)** 2d10+7 bludgeoning, DC 29 **Quetz Couatl Venom** ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) A quetz couatl's venom deals good damage rather than poison damage to fiends; **Saving Throw** DC 29 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d6 poison damage and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d8 poison damage, enfeebled 1, and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 round); **Stage 3** 2d10 poison damage, enfeebled 2, and flat-footed (1 round) **Radiant Wings** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) The quetz couatl spreads its multicolored wings and radiant plumage. Each enemy within 30 feet must attempt a DC 29 Will save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Radiant Wings for 24 hours.
**Success** The creature is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) for 1 round.
**Failure** The creature is dazzled for 1 minute.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but if the creature is evil, it is also [stunned 3](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36). **Wrap in Coils** **Requirements** The quetz couatl has a Medium or smaller creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) in its jaws; **Effect** The quetz couatl moves the creature into its coils, freeing its fangs to make attacks, then uses [Greater Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=19) against the creature. The quetz couatl can hold as many creatures in its coils as will fit in its space.
name: Quetz Couatl
